title: Jimmy Carr, When Will Gronk Unretire, and the Invisible Work of Women
description:
Jimmy Carr (59:54) comes through to roast Feits, tell us that ghosts aren't real, and why atheists are so smug. Gronk announces his retirement so KFC is preparing for him to comeback just in time for the playoffs to help the Pats win another Super Bowl. Is a woman's work invisible? Is a man's? Should KFC freeze his sperm and get a vasectomy?Â Which si worse, teacher's or the service industry? Voicemaisl include: Dinosaur Girl update, keeping condoms, and how to not get ignored.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
